Utilities

Project in development

This project is currently in development. Please excuse the incomplete documentation while we continue working.

Contextual colors

These utility classes give you quick access to colors from the brand palette, most of which correspond to state colors.

muted

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

primary

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

success

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

info

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

warning

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

danger

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
